title: 艺术竞赛中心页-人物
content:
[[=]]
+ 本组获奖作品：Shiro的 //Dr. Gears//
[[/=]]
[[module css]]
.content-panel {
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0px;
    background-color: #fff;
    margin: 10px 0 15px;
    box-shadow: none;
    box-shadow: none;
}
[[/module]]
[[div class="content-panel left-column"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/ShiroGears.png| caption=Shiro所绘的Dr Gears。全图在[https://i.imgur.com/wpmMbM4.png 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaBright.png| caption=Agent Harmonia所绘的Bright。全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/Beware-The-Mad-Scientist-694132659 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/techaartBright.png| caption=来自
https://techaart.tumblr.com 的Dr. Bright。全图在[https://i.imgur.com/bm8N5Hj.png 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaGear.png| caption=Agent Harmonia所绘的Gears。全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/Good-Man-Gears-694606798 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaIceberg.png| caption=Agent Harmonia所绘的Iceberg。全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/Letting-Flames-Ignite-With-Ice-697754240 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaMann.png| caption=Agent Harmonia所绘的Dr. Mann。全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/A-Good-Mann-Never-Dies-699786479 此]。]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-panel right-column"]]
[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/RJRoyBright.png| caption=RJ Roy所绘的Bright。全图在[https://i.imgur.com/KEn71Se.png 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaClef.png| caption=Agent Harmonia所绘的Clef。 全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/Always-In-The-Back-Of-Your-Mind-693998838 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/LunamothKondraki.png| caption=Lunamoth所绘的Kondraki。全图在[https://i.imgur.com/0vSXEYL.png 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AgentHarmoniaRights.png| caption= Agent Harmonia所绘的Dr Rights。全图在[https://akatsukisakura001.deviantart.com/art/Dr-Rights-666001484 此]。]]

[[include component:image-block name=http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/art-contest-hub-characters/AmeiliaHarrizSweetie.jpg| caption=Ameilia Harriz所绘的甜心小姐。全图在[https://i.imgur.com/qwKG1V3.jpg 此]。]]
[[/div]]
author: GazerPara
